name: Josh Dumb
description:
Josh Dumb is a game about a guy named Josh. He is dumb. You take control of his brother, who made this thing called the Josh Defense System (i think), which you actually control to protect Josh.

Place arrows to turn him, springs to bounce him, DESTROY SICK BLOCKS WITH YOUR AXE, and that's it basically.

The game was made for Ludum Dare 46 in April of 2020.

Also, you can rate the game on newgrounds

Also, Catpage is dead.
